text: Na'ankure maka kokankoka vahera zamavare atru hanuge'za Jerusalemi kumapi vahera hara eme huzmante'za kumazmia e'neriza, arohu zamare'za maka'zazmia e'neriza a'naneramina zamazeri haviza hugahaze. Vahetmina amu'nompinti refko hu'za kina huzmante'za zamavare'za vanageno, zamatre'zama vanaza vahe'mo'za eri havizama hutre'zama vanaza kumapi manigahaze.
